data.name: String01
data.value: Visitor badge Please wear your visitor badge clearly visible at all times. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/01_visitor_badge.png

data.name: String02
data.value:
Visitor registration or deregistration
_content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/02_information.svg

data.name: String03
data.value: Travel speed The maximum permitted speed is 20 km/h on the entire premises. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/03_travel_speed.svg

data.name: String04
data.value: Meeting place Find out more about the meeting places. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/04_meeting_place.svg

data.name: String05
data.value: Escape routes and emergency exits Find out about escape routes and emergency exits. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/05_emergency_exit.png

data.name: String06
data.value: Clean room Unauthorized persons are strictly forbidden to enter. All means of access are secured. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/06_clean_room.png

data.name: String07
data.value: Warning of laser beam Make sure that the safety regulations are observed. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/07_laser_beam.svg

data.name: String08
data.value: Warning of explosive atmosphere Make sure that the safety regulations are observed. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/08_explosion_warning.svg

data.name: String09
data.value: Warning of industrial trucks Give priority to transport vehicles and use the pavements priovided. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/09_forklift_warning.svg

data.name: String10
data.value: Warning of high voltage In these areas, dangerous electrical voltages can lead to injuries or even death. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/10_high_voltage.svg

data.name: String11
data.value: No trespassing Signs mark areas that nust not be entered. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/11_no_trespassing.png

data.name: String12
data.value: Photography and filming prohibited Photography and filming is prohibited on the entire premises. Exceptions only after consulation with the management or the responsible person. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/12_no_photography.svg

data.name: String13
data.value: Smoking is prohibited Smoking is prohibited on the entire premises except in the designated areas. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/13_no_smoking.svg

data.name: String14
data.value: No naked flame, fire, ignition source prohibited Handling of open flames, fire and sources of ignition are strictly forbidden. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/14_no_open_flame.svg

data.name: String15
data.value: Pacemakers prohibited Please observe the access ban for persons with pacemakers. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/15_no_pacemakers.svg

data.name: String16
data.value: No touching Touching machines, tools and materials is prohibited without express permission. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/16_no_touching.svg

data.name: String17
data.value: Hot work For any hot work (welding, cutting, soldering, svarfing, cut-off grinding) a certificate of approval must be applied for. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/17_hot_work.png

data.name: String18
data.value: Health hazard In areas with danger isgn the skin or eyes can be irritated or allergies can be triggered. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/18_health_hazard.svg

data.name: String19
data.value: Serious health hazard Areas with this danger sign indicate possible serious damage to health. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/19_serious_health_hazard.png

data.name: String20
data.value: Corrosive In areas with this danger sign, severe skin etching, severe eye damage can occur. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/20_corrosive.svg

data.name: String21
data.value: Oxidizing In areas with this danger sign, chemicals can cause or intensify fires or explosions. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/21_oxidizing.svg

data.name: String22
data.value: Flammable Highly flammable products are used in areas with this danger sign. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/22_flammable.svg

data.name: String23
data.value: Explosive In areas with this danger sign, substances can react even without atmospheric oxygen. Danger of explosion! _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/23_explosive.svg

data.name: String24
data.value: Gases under pressure Gases under pressure can explode and cause injury if stored incorrectly and heated up excessively. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/24_gases.svg

data.name: String25
data.value: Toxic In areas with this danger sign, chemicals in the smalles quantities can lead to life-threatening poisoning. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/25_toxic.svg

data.name: String26
data.value: Dangerous for the environment Always dispose of products with this hazard symbol correctly and never throw them into household waste or sewage. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/26_pollution.svg

data.name: String27
data.value: Use eye protection Signs mark areas/equipment where eye protection should be used. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/27_eye_protection.svg

data.name: String28
data.value: Use hand protection Signs mark areas/equipment where hand protection must be used. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/28_hand_protection.svg

data.name: String29
data.value: Personal protective equipment Observe the mandatory signs / information signs on the operating arte and tghe installations. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/29_protective_equipment.svg

data.name: String30
data.value: Using a handrail Use the handrail when climbing stairs. _content/NBG.Visitor.Blazor/images/safetyicons/30_handrail.svg
